response.overview: Justin Quayle is a low-level British diplomat who has always gone about his work very quietly, not causing any problems. But after his radical wife Tessa is killed he becomes determined to find out why, thrusting himself into the middle of a very dangerous conspiracy.
response.title: The Constant Gardener

results.name: Archival Talks: Ralph Fiennes, "The Constant Gardener"
Rachel Weisz Wins Supporting Actress: 2006 Oscars
